newsitem.title: UK: Clean tanker rates soar in Caribs up U.S. market.
newsitem.headline: Clean tanker rates soar in Caribs up U.S. market.

text.p: Clean tanker rates in the Caribbean jumped dramatically on Wednesday with 30,000 tonners going up the U.S. coast taking up to W240-245. Earlier in the week the level was closer to W215.
"These rates have been supported by recent active fixing and thinning tonnage," one U.S. shipbroker said.
"There have been significantly more enquiries, and an undercurrent of activity has existed recently," the broker added.
Other shippers said the market became squeezed with a number of charterers coming in for tonnage on similar dates.
